StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_UpdateCandidateProgramCriteriaWaiver]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@CandidateWaiverID AS INT, @WaiverID AS INT, @AddCriteria AS CHAR(1), @UserLogin AS VARCHAR(15) AS
SET NOCOUNT ON
IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER CPCW WHERE CPCW.CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID AND CPCW.WAIVER_ID = @WaiverID) BEGIN ------------------------ -- If the record does not exist and the user is trying to add a record, -- then perform the insert. ------------------------ IF @AddCriteria = 'Y' BEGIN INSERT INTO CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER (CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID, WAIVER_ID, USER_LOGIN) VALUES (@CandidateWaiverID, @WaiverID, @UserLogin) END END ELSE BEGIN ------------------------ -- If the record does exist and the user is not trying to add a record, -- then perform the delete. ------------------------ IF @AddCriteria = 'N' BEGIN DELETE FROM CANDIDATE_PROGRAM_CRITERIA_WAIVER WHERE CANDIDATE_WAIVER_ID = @CandidateWaiverID AND WAIVER_ID = @WaiverID END END
------------------------ -- Otherwise, there is nothing to be done. ------------------------
SET NOCOUNT OFF
